info.description: API to create, update and manage fund promoter detail information
info.title: Fund promoter information

get.summary: Retrieves the list of fund promoter informations
get.description: Retrieves the list of fund promoter informations

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

post.summary: Creates a fund promoter information record
post.description: Creates a fund promoter information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.summary: Updates fund promoter information records with identifiers specified in the payload
put.description: Updates fund promoter information records with identifiers specified in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes fund promoter information records with identifiers provided in the payload
delete.description: Deletes fund promoter information records with identifiers provided in the payload

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

get.summary: Retrieves a specific fund promoter information record
get.description: Retrieves a specific fund promoter information record

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Total number of records per page (Default:25)

parameters.name: orders
parameters.description: An 'orders' parameter allows you to specify the order in which rows appear in the result set Eg: orders=fundname:0,masterfund:1 where 'fundname' is field, '0' for ascending manner and ',' as seperator for fields

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: A 'groups' parameter is used to collect data across multiple records and group the results by one or more columns. Eg: groups=nationality,reclaimtax-nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality:COUNT where 'nationality,reclaimtax' is for the fields and 'nationality:EQ:Indian,reclaimtax:EQ:N-nationality' are filters, 'nationality:COUNT' is a aggregator and '-' as seperator

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use a 'filters' parameter to select rows based on a value by using basic operators like EQ, NE etc.., Eg: filters=statistictype:NE:SRS where 'statistictype' is a field, 'NE' is a operator and 'SRS' is a value

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

put.summary: Updates specific fund promoter information record
put.description: Updates specific fund promoter information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

delete.summary: Deletes a fund promoter information record
delete.description: Deletes a fund promoter information record

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

reference.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the record

entityType.description: Identifies the entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

internalId.description: Internal identifier of the records.  Generated by the system during POST and can be used for other operations

promoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

promoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the entity

parent.description: Contains external and internal identifiers of the parent record, if the current record belongs to sub entities

parentEntityType.description: Identifies the parent entity. For e.g. 0001 for registers, 0002 for agents, 0007 for investors, etc.

parentInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the parent record

parentExternalId.description: External identifier of the parent record

parentPromoterInternalId.description: Internal identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

parentPromoterExternalId.description: External identifier of the Fund promoter linked to the parent entity

fundpromoter.description: Contains individual attributes of the Fund promoter entity

paymentFrequency.description: The commission payment frequency. For example: 0001(Monthly), 0002(Quaterly), 0003(Half-yearly), 0004(Yearly) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_FRE_COD.

bankId.description: Bank ID code linked to the Fund Promoter

bankExternalId.description: Bank external ID linked to the Client

zipCode.description: Postal zip code of Fund Promoter address

countryCode.description: Fund Promoter Country Code (in 2 letter code, Eg: LU). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number of the fund promoter

text.description: Free text to add information if any

internalAccountNumber.description: The TA account number. It is not mandatory but necessary for the fund supermarket module.

transferAgent.description: It specifies if the management company is administrated inside the transfer agency or as external. Allowed values: 0001(Yes),0002(No/External). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TFC.

ukTermsOfBusinessFlag.description: Flag allows to calculate the charges that are to be applied to the deal and  related terms of business.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

collectionDates.description: Dates allowed by the Fund promoter to collect the amounts for the RSP investment. Allowed values: 01(Any Banking Day), 02(Specific dates). It is related to UK functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_COLLDAY.

roundingDifference.description: The code to specify where the rounding difference can be allocated in case of multiple switches within the product. This field is used for UK functionality. Allowed values; 0001(Highest value transaction), 0002(First Name Fund). The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_RNDIFF.

ukDistributionProcessFlag.description: Flag to enable UK distribution functionalities (group 1/group 2).  Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

interestRoundingInFavorOfClientFlag.description: Flag allows rounding of Cash Deposit accounts Interest in favour of the client. The field is related to UK functionality. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

interestAllocationMethod.description: Interest allocation method applicable for the Cash Deposit Accounts. Allowed values: 0001(Simple interest), 0002(Compound interest). The field is related to UK functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_INTMTHD.

boxManagerId.description: Box manager ID linked to the Fund Promoter

boxManagerExternalId.description: Box manager external ID linked to the Fund Promoter

tradeDateForSwitch.description: The Trade Date or Value Date calculation method code. For example: 0001(Use TD of the Fund Out), 0002(Use latest TD), 0003,(Use latest TD Recalculated) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TDMTHD.

cancellationTimeframe.description: The number of days within which the investor exercise their cancellation rights. This represents the days between the original deal date and the date of the receipt of cancellation notice.

cancellationProfitLossBearing.description: The code of the party who will bear the loss on cancellation of Buy Deal related to cancellation rights functionality. For example: 0001 (TFC/TFC), 0002 (Client/Client) , 0003(TFC/Client), 0004(Client/TFC). The LoV is available in the CMESS table RE_LOSBEAR.

cancellationLossThreshold.description: The threshold limit, within which Fund promoter will bear the loss arising out of cancellation of Buy Deal. If the loss is more than the threshold limit client pays the entire loss. This field is mandatory only if the Loss bearing is 0003 - Threshold

cancellationLossThresholdCurrency.description: The currency code (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR) for threshold calculation related to cancellation rights functionality. This field is mandatory when 0003 - Threshold method is selected in the field Loss bearing. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

salesmanMandatoryFlag.description: Flag allows to make the salesman parameterization mandatory for the registers.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

saleswatchEnabledFlag.description: Flag allows to make the Saleswatch type parameterization mandatory for all registers willing to invest in funds linked to this Fund Promoter. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

redeemSettledSharesFlag.description: Flag to allow redemption of only settled shares at order entry level. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

backdatedReversalControlFlag.description: Flag to block backdated and reversal orders. Allowed values: Y (to block),N (to unblock), or Null(=N).

contractNotesDetails.description: Flag to allow populating additional details in contract notes. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)  or Null(=N).

backdatedReversalReprocessingFlag.description: Flag to enable reprocessing of contract linkages for all debit contracts after a Backdated transaction or reversal of a historical contract. Allowed values: Y (to enable),N (to disable), or Null(=N).

agentOrderOverrideFlag.description: Flag to enable overriding of agent at order entry level. Allowed values: Y(to enable), N (to disable) or null(=Y).

switchNavPrice.description: The NAV price to consider for Switch and Conversion contracts. Allowed values: C(Only for conversion), N(Neither switch nor conversion), Y(Both switch and conversion). The LoV is available in the CMESS table SWI_CONV.

ctvControlFlag.description: Flag to check at simulation level if the trade limitations set up at MF fund level have been overcome. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)  or Null(=N).

phoneDealingFlag.description: Flag to enable the phone dealing functionality. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

nostroAccountId.description: NOSTRO Account Internal ID for Payment by cheque functionality.

nostroAccountExternalId.description: NOSTRO Account External ID for Payment by cheque functionality.

firstTransactionMinimumLimit.description: Minimum limit amount for first transaction in fund linked to the Fund promoter. The transaction will be blocked at simulation level if the minimum limit is not met.

firstTransactionMinimumLimitCurrency.description: Minimum limit currency  (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR) for first transaction in fund linked to the Fund Promoter. The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

valuationStatementFormat.description: The valuation statement format code to be used for reporting. For example: 201(Valuation Single currecy- Book Value), 209(Valuation Single Currency- performance) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table VALSTFOR.

periodicStatementFormat.description: The periodic statement format code to be used for reporting. For example: 101(Single currency - Book value) , 109 (Single currency - Performance) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PERSTFOR.

branchId.description: Branch internal ID linked to the Fund Promoter.

branchExternalId.description: Branch external ID linked to the Fund Promoter.

coveringLetter.description: It specifies the print instruction for contract notes/statement cover letters/acknowledgement. For example: AAA (Print Statement and Ackowledgement for all Investors), CIW (Print Contract Notes for Individuals only). The LoV is available in the CMESS table COVERLTR.

rightTypeid.description: The rights on Funds by right type ID. For example: ALL(ALL), DAR0(Right Type DAR0) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table RIGHT_TYPE.

positionCheckAtDividendConfirmationFlag.description: Flag to allow automatic payout of the dividends and daily dividends irrespective of the reinvestment instruction set up. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

erisaCheckFlag.description: Flag allows to do ERISA check for the investors investing in the fund linked to this Fund promoter. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

checkOnRegisterPositionFlag.description: Flag to consider the investor as a new investor if he redeems all its shares amd first subscription limits are applied to the investor when investing again in the fund share class. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)  or Null(=N).

softClosureExternalSwitchFlag.description: Flag to enable soft closure only for the switches between different Fund Promoter. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

partialSettlementSubsFlag.description: The flag allows to enable the partial settlement functioanlity. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

giinNumber.description: GIIN identification number. Each registering FI will be given a FATCA ID that will be used for purposes of establishing and accessing the FI's online FATCA account.

exemptionReason.description: FATCA exempt reason code of the Fund promoter. Allowed values: 0001(Foreign government), 0002(Foreign retirement plan), 0003(Non financial publicly traded company), 0004 (Exempt US entity), TBD(TBD). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_EXEMPT.

fatcaStatus.description: FATCA status code. For example: 0000(TBD), 0001(PFFI-Participating FFI), 0002 (NPFFI-Non participating FFI) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_STAGEN.

navValidityPerformancefeeControlFlag.description: Flag allows to check if the NAV input for a fund with performance fees equals the GAV minus Performance fee.  If this is not the case, the system will block the Performance fee calculation. Allowed values: Y(to check),N(no check)

cdscBucket.description: CDSC bucket method code applicable to swicth and transfer. For example: 0001(Proportional Withdrawal), 0002(Use method FIFO for Switches & Transfer), 0003(Use method FIFO for Switches only). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CDSC.

amendPaymentFlag.description: Flag to allow amending the payment information generated.Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No), or Null(=N).

cashFlowid.description: Cash Flow ID code linked to Fund Promoter. Allowed values are from the list of  cash flow Ids defined in cash flow definition in MFGI.

controlOnOrderBankDetails.description: It specifies the control to check bank details of redemption orders at  order entry level. Allowed values: 00 (No control on Order Bank Details), 01(Skip Order bank Details), 02(Bank details mandatory for redmptions). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAY_CTRLBK.

taxNumber.description: Tax number. Field is mandatory when country of residence has been defined as Tax No. mandatory for clients in the ZWIST calculation definition in MFGI.

cdscWriteDownFlag.description: Flag to activate the reporting functionality for CDSC bucket share classes. Allowed values: Y(to activate) , N(to deactivate) or Null(=N).

serviceOffering.description: The entity responsible for the due diligence which is used for reporting to IRS (Internal Revenue Service). Allowed values: 0000(TBD), 0001(Performed by TA), 0002(Performed by TFC). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_SERV.

fatcaModel.description: It specifies the IGA model code. For example: 0000(Non IGA), 0001(IGA Model 1 with reciprocity), 0002(IGA Model 1 without reciprocity), 0003(IGA Model 2). The LoV is available in the CMESS table FAT_MODEL.

stpCancelReverseViaInterfacesFlag.description: Flag to allow STP cancel/reversal via interface. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

paymentAmountHandling.description: Payment amount handling method in contract level. For example: 0001(Use order amount for subs and reds). The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAY_HANDLE.

sponsoringEntityId.description: Central Register Internal ID  having Type as SE, can be specified as Sponsoring Entity External ID.

sponsoringEntityExternalId.description: Central Register External ID  having Type as SE, can be specified as Sponsoring Entity External ID.

debitPendingOrdersForEstPositionsFlag.description: Flag to allow including the pending debit orders for position calculation. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)  or Null(=N).

matchingToleranceAmount.description: The tolerance amount in application currency.

matchingToleranceCurrency.description: Tolerance amount currency (in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR). The LoV is available in the CMESS table MONNAIES.

settlementDate.description: The behavior of the Settlement date update during receipt matching. For example: 01(Match Date), 02(Value date of the Deal), 03(Value date of Receipt) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table SETTLDATE.

collectionAccountGroup.description: Collection Account Group code used to group deals and receipts that can be matched together. The LoV is available in the CMESS table COLACGP.

dividendOnSettledShares.description: It specifies if the dividend reinvestment or payment on the settled shares shall be allowed. Allowed values: Y(Yes), N(No).

globalOrderingFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the global ordering functionality.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

transactionBulkingNettting.description: The grouping or Netting method code of cash movements. For example: 0001(Individual orders in Fund currency), 0002(Individual orders in Payment currency), 0003(Bulked orders in Fund currency) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_BN.

externalTaId.description: Internal ID of  Central Register created with Type as CT  linked to the Fund Promoter.

externalTaExternalId.description: External ID of  Central Register created with Type as CT  linked to the Fund Promoter.

cashDividendRegisterId.description: Technical register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

cashDividendRegisterExternalId.description: Technical register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Cash dividend register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterId.description: Technical Register Internal ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register Internal ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

reinvestmentRegisterExternalId.description: Technical Register External ID having Person type as 0900-Fund, can be specified as Reinvestment register External ID. This field is mandatory when the flag Global ordering is set Y.

paymentProcess.description: The payment process to be followed for the deals. Allowed values: 01(STP), 02(Semi-STP). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PAYPROC.

custodian.description: It specifies if the custodian is internal or external. Allowed values: EXT (External Custodian), INT (Internal Custodian). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_CUSTODY.

blockOrderDeletionFlag.description: Flag to block oder deletion. Allowed values: Y(to Block), N(to Unblock) or Null(=N).

fxReversalFlag.description: The flag allows to include cancelled/reversed order in the client trading desk report. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

fxExportingFlag.description: Flag allows to define the operation codes which are inscope of Forex. It is related to client FX. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

interTfcSwitchesRestrictionFlag.description: Flag allows to block the  switch between two funds linked to different TFCs. Allowed values: Y (to block),N (to unblock)

profitLossMethod.description: It specifies the Profit and loss method code. For example: 0001(Method-1 Dublin), 0002(Method-2 Luxembourg).The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_METHPL.

glFlowId.description: General Ledger Flow ID code linked to Fund Promoter.  Allowed values are from the list of  GL flow IDs defined in GL flow definition in MFGI.

sameTdForAllFOFTransactionsFlag.description: Flag allows to calculate a common valid trade date for the Fund of fund structures at order entry level. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

accountOpeningNoticeFlag.description: Flag to send account opening notice for Fund Promoter. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No).

documentHandling.description: Swift document handling details for theÂ Â Non Swift Trigger ID 0008-Generic static data change. Allowed values: 0001(Auto release) 0002(Hold), 0003(Suppress). The LoV is available in the CMESS table DOC_MGMT.

updatefromFundPromoter.description: The model used to update the TFC based on the Fund Promoter fields.

creditorId.description: Institution ID that collects the money for Savings plan functionality of Standing Instructions.

minimumLimitsMonitoringFlag.description: Flag allows to check the minimum transaction limit at order level. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

shortPositionControl.description: The short position control code for cash redemption orders when the NAV dropped and the original order has insufficient units to cover the instruction. Allowed values: 0001(Block Short Position processing), 0002 (Block short position, with exception, Change to All Position). The LoV is available in the CMESS table SHORT_POS.

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction of the Fund Promoter. The field is related to FATCA functionality. The LoV is available in the CMESS table AML_JURIS.

crsStatus.description: CRS status code. Allowed values: 0000 (TBD), 0001 (Active NFE), 0002 (Passive NFE). The LoV is available in the CMESS table CRS_STAGEN.

imrFlag.description: Flag allows to enable the  IMR functionality.  Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

useType.description: Use type of the Fund Promoter. Possible values: 1(Active), 2(Inactive), X(Pre-entity) etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_USE.

inheritG1G2Flag.description: Flag to check 'Conversion/Switch In' leg of a Conversion/Switch transaction at the Order level. The flag is related to UK distribution. Allowed values: Y(for Yes),N(for No)

retroCashDebitPerFundsFlag.description: Flag to enable hierarchy mechanism to retrieve the retrocession debit account to be used for retrocession payment. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

ukDistributionTaxParametersFlag.description: Flag to enable the UK Distribution Tax Parameters. Allowed values: Y(to enable),N(to disable).

retroCalcCycleEndDatePlusBd.description: It specifies the number of days to be added to business day to  Calculate cycle end date for retrocession calculation.
